title: [Psx] [Ntsc-J] Thunder Storm LX-3 & RoadBlaster (2-Disc Set)
description:
Interactive Movie Action


Thunder Storm LX-3 and Road Blaster (Ntsc-J) for PS1       Rel. in 1995



Format:	       CD-R Ntsc-Japan
Discs:          2
Language:       Mostly English very little is in Japanese.
Image:          Both are CloneCD Image Type (ccd/sub/img).
Requirements:   Modded/Chipped Ps1 or Ps2, Breaker Pro/Boot-cd, 
                Game Enchancer/Built-in Mod (Allows booting of backups), 
                or a psx emulator. (You only need to use one of these methods)

Compressed with Winrar. Both Games were tested and work.

Note: you can extract winrar formats with 7-Zip, 7-Zip is free.

Wanted to upload this because the download links for this game had expired or were deleted, and couldn't find any good live torrents for this.  So any one previously looking for this you can rest at ease, here it is. This 2-disc game was at first a pain to find, but luckly I finally got it.  Hope you like it.


Game Describtion:

Both games are actually ports from the original Arcade Laserdisc versions to the playstation and are fmv type games, like braindead 13 for example, or dragon's lair. This was also released for the Sega Saturn as well. I really couldn't find a proper description anywhere for this 2-disc set psx game, so here's my version.  Not much else to say but this is good collection for any Playstation gamer, and hard to come by so I recommend downloading this while you can.



Burn with Alcohol 120% (Included in download). 

set datatype setting to playstation when burning.

Use Verbatim or Tayio Yuden CD Media, Verbatim is recommended and probably your best bet.


Gamepics included.
